## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;Baking soda contains sodium bicarbonate as well as the acidifying agent (cream of tartar), and also a drying agent (usually starch). 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Chemical|
|Form:|Solid|
